title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Phenomenological Understanding of Quantum Physics

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory Physics and Quantum Mechanics Knowledge
context.additional_context: Targeting current professionals needing to apply quantum theory in practice, conducted via smartphone-based learning in non-PC environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of quantum physics from a microscopic system perspective.
Learners can concretize key theories like the uncertainty principle by linking them to field-specific cases.
Learners can comparatively analyze quantum phenomena through their interconnections with other physics disciplines.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
